title: Cargo Item
description: Addresses the cargo items to be stuffed into a container for a shipment. A cargo item cannot be split across containers.

cargoLineItems.title: Cargo Line Item
cargoLineItems.description: Identifies the specific details of packages within a cargo item.

carrierBookingReference.title: Carrier Booking Reference
carrierBookingReference.description: The associated booking number provided by the carrier for this cargo item. Cannot be used in combination with Shipping Instruction header level carrierBookingReference.

descriptionOfGoods.title: Description of Goods
descriptionOfGoods.description: The cargo description are details which accurately and properly describe the cargo being shipped in the container(s) as provided by the shipper.

HSCode.title: HS Code
HSCode.description: Used by customs to classify the product being shipped.

weight.title: Weight
weight.description: The total weight of the cargo including packaging items being carried in the container(s). Excludes the tare weight of the container(s).

volume.title: Volume
volume.description: Calculated by multiplying the width, height, and length of the packed cargo.

weightUnit.title: Weight Unit
weightUnit.description: The unit of measure which can be expressed in imperial or metric terms

volumeUnit.title: Volume Unit
volumeUnit.description: The unit of measure which can be expressed in either imperial or metric terms

numberOfPackages.title: Number of Packages
numberOfPackages.description: Specifies the number of packages associated with this cargo item

packageCode.title: Package Code
packageCode.description: The unique identifier for the package type
